attributes.additional_details: This way there won’t be protests to get St.Patrick’s day uncanceled and that they’re will be peace in Belfast.
attributes.background: To not cancel St.Patrick’s day for Catholics as Protestants got their holidays.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for Belfast City Council

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
